question: Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenga abiri y'ubwoko bumwe keretse  kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:

options: Inyuma ni itara ry'umutuku ritwariwe ibumoso n'umuntu uri ku murongo  w'inyuma hafi y'umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
Imbere ni itara ry'umuhondo ritwariwe ibumoso
Inyuma ni itara ryumutuku ritwariwe iburyo n'umuntu uri ku murongo  w'inyuma hafi y'umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
question: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n'uko ibihe bimeze nk'igihe cy'ibihu  cyangwa cy'imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, udutsiko twose  tw'abanyamaguru nk'imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw'abanyeshuri bari ku murongo  bayobowe n'umwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu  barenze umwe bagomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:

options: A na B Ni Ibisubizo By'ukurii
question: Iki Cyapa Gisobanura Iki?
Iki cyapa gisobanuye iki?

options: Iherezo ry'ibibuzwa byose mu karere ku binyabiziga bigenda
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Ntugomba kugira undi muyobozi w'ikinyabiziga unyuraho
Ugomba kunyura kukindi kinyabiziga uvugije ihoni
question: Mu gihe hari undi muyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ugukurikiye watangiye kukunyuraho :
Nibura ikinyabiziga gitegetswe kugira uduhanagurakirahure tungahe

options: Iyo nta cyapa cyo gutambuka mbere gihari
Iyo ikimenyetso kimurika cyagenewe ibinyabiziga kidakora
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ni ryari itegeko rigenga gutambuka mbere kw'iburyo rikurikizwa mu masangano:

options: gukomeza n'umuvuduko uri hejuru kuko umunyeshuli agomba gutegereza
question: Igihe ubonye icyapa kigaragaza ishuli wakora iki?

options: Kuva mumuhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi ugahagarara ahantu hatekanye
Kwihuta cyane kugirango usoze urugendo vuba
question: Mugihe uri mu rugendo rurerure mu muhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi ni iki  wakora mugihe wumva utangiye kugira ibitotsi?

options: Guhindukira cyangwa kujya mukindi gice cy'umuhanda
question: Umurongo ucagaguye uvuga ko buri muyobozi abujijwe kuwurenga uretse mu gihe:

options: ubugerure cyangwa amarengamategeko rusange cyangwa ibibujijwe ndetse  n'ibitegetswe byihariye
a na b ni ibisubizo by' ukuri
question: Ibyapa by'inyongera bishobora kumenyesha

options: kuguma inyuma yacyo kugirango yemerere ibindi binyabiziga gutambuka
kuguma yicyo kinyabiziga hagati mu muhanda
gutwarira inyuma ye umwegereye cyane kugirango ureke ibindi binyabiziga  bibanyureho
gutanga ibimenyetso kubindi binyabiziga ko byabanyuraho
question: Umuyobozi w' ikinyabiziga agendera inyuma y'ikindi kinyabizaga akaba adateganya  kukinyuraho yakora iki ?

options: A na b ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ikinyabiziga gishya gikenerwa gusuzumwa bwambere nyuma y'igihe kingana iki  ?
Ni iyihe feri ituma imodoka igenda buhoro kandi igahagarara ku buryo bwizewe  bubangutse kandi nyabwo, uko imodoka yaba yikoreye kose yaba igeze ahacuramye  cyangwa ahaterera:
Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe  n'ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo
Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe  n'ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo  bikurikira:

options: Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 20 kuri buri ruhande
question: Ibizirikisho by'iminyururu cyangwa by'insinga kimwe n'ibindi by'ingoboka bikoreshwa  gusa igihe nta kundi umuntu yabigenza kandi nta kindi bigiriwe uretse gusa kugirango  ikinyabiziga kigere aho kigomba gukorerwa kandi nturenze na rimwe km 20 mu isaha,  ibyo bizirikisho bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:

options: Mu gihe ushaka kuburira abandi bakoresha umuhanda
mugihe ikinyabiziga cyawe gishobora guteza ibyago
A na B ni ibisubizo byukuri
question: Ni ryari ushobora kwakiriza icyarimwe amatara ndangacyerekezo yose y' ikinyabziga

options: ishobora no kugira imikandara kuzindi ntebe z'inyuma
question: Buri modoka yagenewe gutwara abantu, ariko umubare wabo ntarengwa ukaba munsi  ya 6 umuyobozi abariwemo igomba kugira imikandara yo kurinda ibyago igenewe aba  bakurikira:
